snippet: Duke Energy is asking a judge to prevent citizens groups from taking part in any action that would make it clean up nearly three dozen coal ash pits in the state.
abstract: Duke Energy company is asking a judge in North Carolina to prevent citizens groups from taking part in any action that would make it clean up nearly three dozen coal ash pits in the state; company faces suit arguing that the pits polluted groundwater.
lead_paragraph: Duke Energy is asking a judge to prevent citizens groups from taking part in any action that would make it clean up nearly three dozen coal ash pits in the state.

headline.main: North Carolina: Duke Energy Wants Citizens Groups Barred From Complaint
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Duke Energy Wants Citizens Groups Barred From Complaint

keywords.value: Department of Environment and Natural Resources (NC)
